name: Sundrip Luminous Liquid Bronzer with Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides
about: What it is: A noncomedogenic, peptide serum bronzer that hydrates and blurs skin while providing a streak-free, sheer-but-buildable, universal sunkissed glow...Coverage: Light.Finish: Radiant.Formulation: Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients: - Matrixyl® 3000 Peptides: Seamlessly blurs the look of fine lines and visibly firms and support the skin barrier..- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides smooth, lightweight hydration..- CoQ10 + Vitamin E: Powerful antioxidants that fights against free radicals...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This clean, nongreasy liquid bronzer acts like a serum, delivering skin-loving peptides, antioxidants, and hyaluronic acid that hydrates, blurs, and visibly firms skin. The subtle shimmer disappears on application, leaving a luminous bronzy glow. The Sundrip Skin-Boosting Seamless Serum Bronzer Drops can be used all over face and body or as contour.
ingredients: -Matrixyl® 3000 Peptides: Seamlessly blurs the look of fine lines and visibly firms and support the skin barrier..-Hyaluronic Acid: Provides smooth, lightweight hydration..-CoQ10 + Vitamin E: Powerful antioxidants that fights against free radicals...Water/Aqua, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Mica, Coco-Caprylate, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Boron Nitride, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Galactoarabinan, Polysorbate 20, Pentylene Glycol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Phospholipids, Phytosterols, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Ubiquinone, May contain [+/-] Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide CI 77891.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply streak-free formula directly on face and body..-Buildable formula allows you to layer to increase pigment for sunkissed skin...Tips:.-Mix with primer for a filtered bronzed look..-Mix with moisturizer for a more sheer bronzed tint..-Can be used all over face and body or as contour...Recycling Instructions:.-Curbside recycle the FSC-certified post-consumer recycled paper carton..-Unscrew the 50 percent PCR cap. .-Clean out the remaining bronzer formula from the 100 percent glass jar and cap with warm water and dish soap..-Take the clean bottle and recycle at your local Sephora Pact Collective bin or mail to Pact Collective on caliraybeauty.com.

reviews.review_title: Almost amazing - Please offer more shades!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer feels fresh and light on the skin. There is some shimmer, but I don’t find it to look “glittery”. How and how much product you’ll use will depend on your skin tone, depth, and desired result. In the fall and winter, my skin is light with mostly neutral undertones. I have to use this with a very light touch. I use less than a pea size amount and mix it with my foundation and a bit of moisturizer. This adds a subtle glow and just enough color to add some life to my skin. I then use a bit less than a pea sized amount and tap on my cheeks. I have to be really careful not to use more than the bare minimum so it doesn’t look orange rather than sun kissed. I wish this came in more shades because this color is difficult to work with on fair to light/medium-ish skin. The light formula feels nice, and it hasn’t caused any irritation or breakouts. I also love mixing a little with my body lotion if I’m wearing a top that exposes my chest or arms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had the time to try out the Sundrip Luminous Liquid Bronzer with Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides for a while now and here are my thoughts. I love using it by itself or layering it with a foundation or skin tint. It leaves me bronzed and glowy and that is what I am trying to achieve all summer long. However, I'd love to see more of a selection for the shade range!

reviews.review_title: Must have for summer glow all year!

The lightweight formula blends effortlessly and is buildable for customizable coverage. Perfect for a healthy, luminous complexion year-round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this sundrip! It gives my face & instant tan look. It's easy to blend, totally buildable, feels light on my skin & can be mixed with whatever. Love applying it all over my face after skincare & then just a little concealer if I need it...or with Caliray skin tint & done! Works great anywhere else I need a bronze glow too! My new summer staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel so lucky that I got to try this product, loving this bronzer loving the texture and loving the packaging . I feel my skin is loving it so far, as my skin is little bit more sensitive now a days than before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is actually amazing for the skin, I have pale skin and struggle from redness so when I use it it gives me that natural tan and summer glow and evens out my skin tone. The product is pigmented so a little bit goes a long way and it is also buildable which is what I love. 10/10 recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronzer liquid so much!! It blends like a dream and leaves a bronzed look to the skin that’s also looks really glowy, this bronzer is perfect for the summertime to use on the face and body!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency of the product and that you truly don’t need much. I think this product would work on a variety of tones from possibly light medium to tan, it doesn’t go deep enough to work on my medium deep complexion. For some reference I’m a Fenty 420. It does give a glow which I could use as a highlight but it definitely does not bronze me as it’s too light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the concept of a bronzer serum, and this product is amazing! I’m a paler girly so I love that this product gives me a nice warm glow while also helping me look so radiant and gives me such glowy skin! Absolutely love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new first time using this type of all over face bronzing product, and now I don't think I could live without it! I've personally been mixing this with my moisturizer, and it applies evenly to my skin and gives me a nice glow. Sometimes I go in with foundation after (if I want more coverage) but other times just leave it as is. Great staple product!

Let me just say I love the bronze look this product gives me. I used this product while I was at the beach mixed into my moisturizer and it left a glowy look perfect for vacation. It looks good alone or with foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this for summer time! It’s a great all over bronze and also great as a bronzer on some areas!! Love the shade and how it feels in the skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is summer in a bottle! This is perfect for those who want a little more color. I know this is advertised for the face but I like to put this on my chest as well. It isn’t sticky and doesn’t have a scent. Really good bronzing drops!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really enjoying the formula of this Caliray Sun boosting serum bronzer. It blends perfectly on bare skin with sunscreen or as I like to use it, with make up. I have actually tried a lot of serum bronzer formulas, and this is my favorite one. The other ones that I’ve tried to have been very streaky, but this one blends in seamlessly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super surprised at how pretty this looked on my skin! I thought this would pull warm on my skin but to my delight, this liquid bronzer gave such a natural warmth to my skin . It blended easily without streaking or appearing blotchy. I love that this also has skincare ingredients. Really nice product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if I see much of a difference with this product but maybe I need to mix it in with my primer/sunscreen. It definitely is dark but once you rub it in it fades out to match your skin tone. I’ll need to give it another few more tries

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product out all over alone & I was impressed! It is super light weight feels just like a serum that melts into your skin and when it sets feels like nothing! Using it alone gave me a bronzed sunkiss glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning! The serum is completely multipurpose, and it blends seamlessly with any foundation or on bare skin, it adds the perfect glow and warmth without being too red or orange on fair skin, definitely a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this serum bronzer! The way I have been using it is by mixing it in with my foundation and it gives me a natural bronze look and well as it keeps my face more hydrated. Such a good product and perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this bronzer serum is truly beautiful! I like to mix one half drop in with my moisturizer. It gives my skin the most beautiful, natural bronze glow without looking fake. I then like to take a bit more in a brush and add more to my forehead and cheeks for added bronze in those areas. It’s the perfect I’ve just been in the sun look without actually being in the sun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this new browser product. It blends so seamlessly and I used it with a little bit of moisturizer so it blends better on my face. I use it before I put my every day make up on as a gorgeous skin tint. It’s such a lightweight glow look so it’s perfect for the summer when you wanna look more bronze and gorgeous. This product is a 10 out of 10 for me and will be recommending to all my friends. Absolutely love this the brand killed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Summer is here!! This is the perfect skin bronzer shade and brand you can use 😫 it’s so soft and leaves your skin looking hydrated and of course bronzed out, it also has shimmer which always looks so nice out in the sun, I really recommend this bronzer it’s really easy to apply and also has a very little scent! Love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Caliray's Sundrip Bronzer gives a sunkissed glow & feels hydrating on skin. I use it all over for a natural, buildable bronze that looks luminous & healthy. Love this for an effortless bronzed look! It truly gives you a vacation look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was intrigued by this serum bronzer because of it being fragrance free. It indeed is fragrance free & as someone that is sensitive with scents I appreciate it.  It's also claimed that the formula is lightweight, & I completely agree. The formula is not oily or heavy...I'm not sure if it's just my mind but I even feel like it leaves the skin soft.  The color gives a nice subtle tan & you could layer it. The shimmer is also subtle so you could mix into foundations & not have major glitter pieces all over.  My one & only down is that you really have to make sure you rub it in well on areas that have more lines/wrinkles etc. If not the bronzer kind of looks muddy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product scared me at first. I’m very pale so when I first tried this, I used way too much. I learn that I only need the smallest amount to achieve the sunkissed look. This product is very hydrating which I love, especially for the summer. I am enjoy how bronzey this makes the skin and that you can sheer it out or build ontop of it. I can see myself using this a lot this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sundrip skin boosting peptide serum is perfect for summers!! Gives you instant bronzy look and is so easy to apply. I either apply it directly or mix it with my foundation. The color and glow is just *chef’s kiss*.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very nervous to try this but I needed up being very pleasantly surprised. I pump the product out onto the back of my hand and then tap the brush into the product before applying. I applied the product over a light + medium coverage foundation. I found that the product blended out easily and did not disrupt my foundation. This product was also buildable, to the point where I think medium skin tones could still use it to bronze. If you have a deeper skin tone I could see this working as a highlight but not a bronzer. I felt the product looked the best when it wasn’t set with powder. I felt like the powder took a lot of the pigment away and made it less noticeable that I was wearing bronzer. If the product wasn’t set it maintained a more rich pigment and you had the glowy bronze effect still in tack! This product in my experience is long lasting (10-12 hours). Overall I would recommend it if this sounds like something that you would enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just the best for summertime and having that beautiful glow. I love that. I only need about a pump of this if I’m just doing my face and it gives me a nice sun kiss to look. I love how there is skin care mess and it looks natural and it is not greasy it last all day and it does not transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite bronzing drops!!! It blends into the skin so flawlessly and gives me a sun kissed look! It’s also so buildable so if I have more of a tan I can make it a bit darker than everyday! Definitely a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Sundrip Skin-boosting peptide serum bronzer by Caliray is great. I love to get a natural sunkissed effect without the sun damage and this product gives that. I use all over my face for a natural bronzed look. I like that it is buildable and I can go deeper on the bronzing effect in the winter. I also appreciate that I can use on my face and body when usually products are one or the other. It seems like it would work for many skin types since I have dry skin on my forehead and combo in my nose and chin area and it made my forehead feel moisturized without making my nose area feel oily. It feels lightweight and lovely on skin - recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronzer! It feels so hydrating and glowy on the skin, it is a perfect color of brown and compliments the skin so well. I would highly recommend this to anyone trying to really tamper a nice look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Caliray has done it again! For this pale girl, the new sundrip skin-boosting peptide serum bronzer gives me such a beautiful natural glow. I like that it has medium coverage and I can build the intensity to what I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love putting this on for a no makeup makeup look, to brighten my face on a no makeup day (especially when everything else is tan besides my face) and for a beautiful glow. this is now part of my everyday routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this bronzer. It’s perfect on days I don’t want to wear makeup. I take one pump and put it all over my face. It’s super lightweight and feels hydrating and gives me a subtle bronze color all over. Start out with just one pump and then if you want more color, add a second pump. Sometimes I do, but a little goes a long way. It’s super buildable, so you can start out conservatively.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this bronzer! It’s light and buildable with a golden bronzy glow. It doesn’t look muddy. Looks great on the cheeks and collarbone! I’m more on the pale side and this gave my face some much needed soft warmth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve recently come back from vacation and come back with a beautiful tan, but my face is slightly lighter because of sunscreen. This beautiful bronzing peptide serum has helped me look so sun kissed. The formula feels like a gel and glides so well on the skin. It’s very bronze in the bottle but blends into a beautiful subtle tan. It stays on my skin all day and looks so glowy when mixed with my favorite Caliray skin tint or moisturizer. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronzer so much. It’s so lightweight and gives my face a nice tan and glowy look. I could honestly just wear it like that. I prefer this over any other bronzer and it’s a plus that it has skin boosting peptides!

reviews.review_title: Gives my pale skin a nice bronzey glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure if this product was for me, but I’ve really enjoyed using it over the last week. Love the packaging and glass bottle with pump. One pump is all you need to cover your face. I like to use this after spf as a first bronzing base underpainting step. It gives my face a nice warmth and glow, without being too orangey (Based on swatching on my hand, i thought it would be but it’s really not)! I then go in and spot conceal where i need to and tone down any parts that look too bronzed (I’m very pale naturally). It plays well with my makeup and feels like skincare. I am a big fan of this product and caliray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this bronzer so much. On no makeup days I like to mix it with my moisturizer and use the product as a bronzing drop or I use a big fluffy brush and swirl the product onto the high points of my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how these bronzing drops leave my skin with a nice tan and bronze with a light shimmer. I love how I can use these on my neck and body also. I also love how they aren’t patchy like other bronzers/ bronzing drops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really shocked at the sun kissed tone , and I also was really suprised by the feel I guess I wasn’t expecting it to be a plump cloudy feel when applying this being said I will absolutely continue to use Cali rays peptide bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product and I would love to say this is perfect for the summer. I live in sunny south Florida and it too hot for makeup lately but a pump of this bronzer mixed in with a moisturizer is chef kiss. For me it’s not to much but just the perfect amount of bronze that makes my skin glow and look like I’m wearing a no foundation makeup look. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is amazing! I used it as a Bronzy drop type of thing I just put a little with moisturizer and then put foundation on top and it gave me the most perfect sun tan look I would highly recommend! I also used it as a regular bronzer and it has a nice glowy finish making my skin look pretty good!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I also have sensitive skin and haven’t had any problems with pore clogging/breakouts/sensitivity! Overall HIGHLY recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started off with half a pump to see how it would apply on my skin. It worked really well when I spread it out with my fingers and then tapped it in with a brush. It provided a really nice glow from within, especially on the high points of my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

It didn’t give me any shine or dewyness which I actually prefer since that can look greasy real quick. Overall, it made me look like I had a natural tan. Mixed beautifully with my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really pretty bronzing product that is quite versatile and very comfortable. Perfect for those looking for a glow! If it’s for bronzing, this will mostly suit lighter skin depths I’m afraid. However, if it’s a glow you’re after and you have a deeper complexion, you may want to play with it in store to see if the undertone works. Looks beautiful as a body highlight! My favorite way to use it is all over the face over SPF. I’ll dot on a little concealer and run out the door. I truly hope that more shades will be added as this will only stretch so far as a bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These bronzing drops are so nice! They are buildable too. In my first picture is a thiner layer on the cheakbones and forehead applied with my hands. The second picture is it built up with a large fluffy brush . It's very hydrating and gives a subtle glow to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using this kind of product but so far I like it. The formula hydrates, blur and blends seamlessly into my skincare and makeup, enhancing my complexion with a natural looking bronze tint or gives a beautiful finish to my makeup. A little goes long way with this product and the price point is amazing.

reviews.review_title: Layerable bronzing serum perfect for the summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I typically don't use bronzing products like this serum as someone with melanated skin but wanted to give this new product a try. I've also tried applying the serum all over my face on it's own when using just concealer on my face and it gave me such a natural glow. I also love that this product doesn't make me break out. I was gifted this product in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GORGEOUS!!!!! A bronzy summery dream. Streak free is correct, I’ve been mixing with my moisturizer and it just looks so natural and sunkissed. It’s not glittery like other bronzing drops so it looks much more natural. A new fav for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Sundrip bronzing serum is my new go-to for a beautiful, glowy bronze look, perfect for summer. I love mixing it with my matte foundations for a radiant base or using it alone for a bronzed glow. The lightweight formula feels amazing and blends seamlessly into my skin. Highly recommend if you want to add a touch of summer bronze to your look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best bronzing drops I’ve tried! Other bronzing drops would just blend away from my skin and I’d never notice any bronzing or tanning effect. This one has such a nice glow on my skin, and makes my skin look so bronzed without looking orange. Didn’t break me out of my face so I will definitely be using this for the summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this bronzer today and I really like the glass component is very rich but melt very nice to the like a moisturizer I’m medium light skin tone and it did makeup my skin a little more darker but I can see used this product more on summer time .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely thrilled with the Caliray SunDrip Skin Boosting Peptide Serum Bronzer! This is my first time trying a serum bronzer, and I couldn't be more excited about it. There are so many versatile ways to use this product, and I'm obsessed with each one.   As a contour, it gives me a beautifully natural look. On days when I'm only wearing blush, I add a little bit of this serum to contour my face, and it leaves me looking radiant and glowing. For that perfect sun-kissed glow, I mix it with my moisturizer and apply it all over my face. The result? An incredible, luminous complexion that I can't get enough of.  What's even better is that it has amazing skin benefits! Packed with peptides, it not only enhances my makeup but also improves my skin's health. The added hyaluronic acid provides excellent hydration, making it a must-have in my beauty routine.   I love using it as a quick contour when I'm not wearing foundation—just blush and this bronzer for a fresh, vibrant look. It's perfect for my on-the-go lifestyle, offering a quick pop of color and vibrance.   I can't recommend the Caliray SunDrip Skin Boosting Peptide Serum Bronzer enough. It has transformed my makeup routine, especially since I prefer a natural look. It's a game-changer, and I am absolutely in love with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this new style of bronzer on the market, I know there’s many ways to use it but my favorite is to mix one pump with my morning sunscreen and it gives my base skin a healthy glow. It really elevates the whole makeup applying experience

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I love it

reviews.review_text: Amazing product!!! The packaging has a very high quality feel. This product has a light/ sheer coverage but is easily build able. I appreciate that there are days where I want a lighter finish. This product leaves my skin feeling hydrated with a dew finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great bronzer at an affordable price point! This gives a sunkissed, fresh from the beach look anywhere you choose to use it! I used this on my face arms, stomach and legs. It is easy to blend and streak free. Long lasting and doesn’t smudge on clothes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bronzer looks very dark right out of the bottle but it is much more subtle when applied. I find that for my East Asian complexion, using one pump for my entire face, layering it twice, gives a very noticeable effect.   I love that this blends seamlessly and I don't need other tools to blend it, just using my fingers works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's very light on the skin and isn't too heavy which I really enjoy. It doesn't have a scent which I can also appreciate. The packaging is super good quality and cute. I would say this has pretty light coverage which is perfect for the summer time coming up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate that the Caliray Sun Drip contains clean ingredients as well as skincare. It is a beautiful glowy bronzer but be aware that it is not transfer proof. I have yet to get try it for a long period of time or in the heat but just based off how long I’ve been wearing it I will probably stick to using it sparingly on my face and not body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer really makes my skin look sun kissed and naturally evened. Its super hydrating and light. I like to use this like a bronzer on my face, then to accentuate my collar bones and my shoulders. I love that you can use this all over your body and you can really build it up or sheer it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Caliray Sun drip bronzer is an absolute love. I used it to contour my face and body glow. It is very light weight and easy to buildup. I started small. It is very hydrating and gives a glowy finishing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great peptide bronzer! I’ve been getting into skincare and makeup so I love that this gives you that sunkissed glow without feeling guilty about using so much heavy makeup on your face. Perfect for work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous and easily used bronzy serum! It's super buildable and is easily blended. It can be used as a bronzer or as an all over bronzer drops mixed with your moisturizer! Highly recommend trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a cute bronzer when you use it with makeup. I used it with foundation and it kinda took some of my foundation off but when I used a very light foundation the bronzer blended seamlessly to my skin. Light weight and gave me that Sunkissed tanned glow. Felt very hydrating but for my oily skin I would still not put foundation on with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with a very fair skin tone, I am usually hesitant on bronzer. In fact, liquid bronzer can counterintuitively look worse on my skin tone than powder (I think because it might be harder to control?)  I went into this product unsure what to expect, but excited for the non-shimmer claims most of all. It is surprising initially: it looks like it will have subtle shimmer. But exactly as they promise, once you blend it into the skin, it looks natural and radiant vs shimmery.  I also wanted to talk about using this on the forehead/hairline as I am someone with not only fair skin, but blonde hair as well (see why i'm so cautious with bronzer lol). I am SO happy to report that this is not getting into my hair and looking off! What I've been doing is using merely 1/2 pump (pressing lightly) and dotting that all over my forehead/cheekbones. Then I spread it upwards into my hairline. I think that because the texture feels more like a skincare product than a liquid bronzer, that may help to explain why it's not messy/sticky/heavy to use.  Finally, I feel this is an incredible value for what you get. The bottle is an entire ounce, and given that 1/2 pump is giving this natural, sunkissed look, I think the product will last quite a while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this bronzer a lot! Amazing value for pricepoint. It is smooth and doesn’t leave streaks, this is an issue that I’ve had with some serum bronzers. It is great for a natural, no makeup day, or to go under makeup as primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was insanely excited to test this bronzer. In the past, I've really struggled to get that dewy, shimmery look. Though it appears dark, the serum glides on with ease, making for a lovely buildable base. I feel like I have the perfect sun-kissed look, very light and natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this bronzer does a very good job at bronzing up the skin giving a healthy glow, it can be used all over the face or just on the hollows of the cheek i use it for both depending on my mood i like the consistency

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is perfect for giving you that warm summer glow. Its texture is liquidity but perfect for building up your glow. I used my fingers to apply and it spread out perfectly. It’s sort of has a slight shimmer to it which adds the perfect amount of glow. Love the thin and sheerness to it so that way you can apply and build up. Perfect to warm up your face and give you a super bronzey look. It’s also a plus that it has skincare built into it as well to hydrate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely product, definitely feels more like a skincare serum than a bronzer. It gives just the right amount of warmth without looking to dark dark or too orange. I have been using this to add a little more color to my face without excess product and it is flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As summer approaches, I’ve been a little worried about how I’ll manage to keep my face looking the same color as my body as I hardly ever have the sun on my face due to using retinol products. Then came Sundrip’s peptide serum bronzer. When I tell you this stuff is WEIGHTLESS! I mixed half a pump with my moisturizer and I can’t tell any difference between just my moisturizer and them mixed together. It’s so lightweight! The color is also sheer and buildable, so as the skin on my body darkens, I’ll be able to better match it with more pumps of the bronzing serum. It does have a bit of sheen, but that helps give a natural, dewey look. I prefer a natural look to my makeup and adding this serum in helps me achieve that without having to do a full face of makeup. The packaging is also really nice, it comes in a glass bottle with a pump and the formula truly is unscented! I really love this bronzing serum so much and have my next bottle waiting in my cart already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am beyond obsessed with this bronzer! I add just a small drop to my spf moisturizer and BOOM! Perfect, tanned skin! Leaves no streaks! It’s so natural, I absolutely love this for summer so I don’t have to wear makeup! A little goes a long way, so this bottle will last you a long time! Highly recommend for your summer makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this bronzer after my skin care routine to really make my face look glow and have a nice bronze sun kissed base on my face. It adds such a nice natural and warm glow easily into the skin and doesn’t make my face look too greasy or oily I love it.

reviews.review_title: A new must have for my summer routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying bronzer (yes, I know...I'm late to the party).  I know I made the right choice on which one to test out because I love this and it's easy to apply. I like how it's a clean formula and is also a serum instead of a standard bronzer. If you're new like me, then know that a little goes a LONG way. It's shiny and feels great on the skin. It also doesn't take away previous make-up underneath it like foundation. I'm going to be using this a lot for the next few months!! Maybe this will help me not look like a ghost during the winter too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shine and how it gives a light tint! It doesn’t look splotchy . It helps add a summer look without making me look too burnt. Since i have pale skin, I dont really burn on my face but the rest of my body does over time so this helps even out skintone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of all of Caliray’s products and this bronzer is no different. I love the versatility of it. You can wear it alone to give your face a nice bronzy glow, you can mix with moisturizer as well and wear under foundation. You can also use it as a typical liquid bronzer and it works really well that way too especially paired with the Caliray skin tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous!!! I love this so much. The texture is so smooth and hydrates my dry skin. It spreads easily and doesn’t cling to my blemishes or dry patches, which is a huge feat! It sinks into my skin and leaves it so dewy. I use it both as a bronzer and as an all over base for a dewy glow. The fact that it’s a clean product easily makes this my new favorite bronzing drops/serum.

reviews.review_title: Pretty shade and very nice cooling serum bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Caliray Sundrip Skin-Boosting Peptide Serum Bronzer is absolutely stunning. I'm thoroughly impressed by how effortlessly it applies  a little truly goes a long way. The serum bronzer offers a delightful cooling effect upon application, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Its blendability is exceptional, making it a breeze to achieve a flawless finish. The shade adds the perfect touch of bronzy glow, accentuating my nose and highlighting my favorite features with ease. Plus, the lightweight luminous effect is a game-changer for my makeup routine. Crafted with top-quality ingredients, and packaged so beautifully, it's a definite win-win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this bronzer by caliray. It is so easy to apply. It gives me such a beautiful glow and looks so beautiful under or over makeup. I also nix it with my foundation for shade matcha ne glowy finish. .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product, I thought it was going to look orange on me but it didn't. It gives me a natural brozi look I love that it has great ingredients that nourish the skin while giving a sunkissed look. The formula is lightweight and hydrating.  Definitely one of the best options out there.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a minimalist sunkissed look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with any product that makes me feel less pale without a face full of makeup. A little goes a long way with this! One or two pumps, maybe even less, is all you need. It’s very buildable. It truly adds bronze and a glow. I like it for my face, chest, and sometimes shoulders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend this product to anyone who wants a natural-looking glow without the hassle of powder bronzers. It's perfect for those who have dry or oily skin, as it's lightweight and non-greasy. If you're looking for a more intense bronze effect, you may want to consider other products on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay this product is so versatile. I like to use it as a contour some days and other days as a bronzer. I love that it gives your skin a sun kissed warmth and adds a gorgeous glow. It also is light reflecting so my fine lines and wrinkles are less visible. The shade is ideal and literally you look like you have been kissed by the sun. This is the perfect product for a healthy glow and happy looking skin.  I can’t get enough of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzing drops make my skin look so glowy! It is the perfect shade for the summer and really makes me look like a bronze goddess! I am obsessed with this product. It’s great under foundation too and doesn’t pill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful bronzing serum it gives my skin a natural sunkissed glow. It’s hydrating and lightweight on the skin and makes my skin appear almost airbrushed. One pump is really all I need for my face, I don’t like to apply self tanner to my face so this is the perfect perfect alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: That’s the best bronzing drops i have ever tried!! It’s sheer but leave some warmth behind. It’s hydrating but still lightweight. Plays well with makeup, underneath or mixed. Price is also right!!  Totally recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the packaging and the tint cute bottle this is in. I wish this was a little lightweight while blending but I love the consistency and the ability to absorb onto my skin easily. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Healthy glow that’s good for your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a bronzer that gives that perfect sun-kissed glow without looking overdone, and I finally found it with this new luminous liquid bronzer. It blends seamlessly into my skin, leaving a radiant, natural-looking finish that lasts all day. What I really love is how it feels on my skin—super lightweight and hydrating, thanks to the hyaluronic acid and peptides in the formula.   The shimmer is just right, not too glittery but enough to give a fresh, dewy look. It's also buildable, which is great for transitioning from a daytime to an evening look. Plus, it's from a clean beauty line, which makes me feel good about using it every day. If you're looking for a bronzer that'll give you a healthy glow while caring for your skin, this is the one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use things like this everyday as a pale gal I need something to help give me my summer bronze look I love this it blends very well I like to wear it just with some moisturizer for a no makeup makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sundrip skin boosting peptide serum bronzer works extremely well! It gives your skin the best, most beautiful bronze glow! It’s not a weird orange color or anything. I highly recommend trying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this bronzer serum for summer. It's a lightweight sheer buildable formula. It gives your skin tje healthiest freshest looking sun-kissed glow. It's a natural looking lit from within glow. Works well under makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfect for an everyday use to give you that nice sunkissed Bronzed look without the shimmer. This is great also to mix with a moisturizer to have a slight tan all over the face and neck. Perfect color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous liquid bronzer that makes me look sunkissed to the gods! It feels so lightweight and blends out like a dream on my skin. It doesn't leave me looking muddy like other liquid bronzers do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to find that perfect bronzer that makes me look sun kissed without looking too muddy. I think this might be it. It does not get patchy when mixing it into my moisturizer. I also love how easy it is to run it in and make it look so flawless. Easily could be used with or without foundation. I love how great this product is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product that blends perfectly into the skin, melting and leaving a glow finish, of healthy and fresh, naturally tanned skin. Moisturizes the skin without leaving patches. Very little product is enough to blend it and cover the entire face. I love that it is multi-use because it can be used on both the face and the entire body. I'm using it especially on my legs now that summer is just starting and I'm starting to wear my winter-spring transitional wardrobe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So why are these so good?!?! I use this under my BB cream and I look like bronze goddess! It acts like a primer and moisturizes my skin so my mornings are so quick now! One pump does a lot and on days where I just want it on my cheeks I dab it on a brush and apply on my cheek bones! Will definitely rebuy 🫣

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very happy with Caliray Sundrip Skin Boosting Serum Bronzer. A little goes a long way. I have light complexion and one pump is enough to make my skin look sun kissed. The texture is very lightweight and non-greasy. My skin looks luminous and hydrated. I received a lot of compliments from my friends how pretty I looked. It’s a beautiful healthy glow! I apply this bronzer as a contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it is so good. I love the glow it gives me! My skin tone is very uneven when it comes to my neck because of using sunscreen so this evens it out so I can just wear concealer after applying the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty bronzer. I am calm skin and I thought that this won’t work on me, but it gives a dimension to the face and also looks very pretty. This is going to be my favourite this summer. Also really love that it is universal shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is awesome! Very pigmented! A little goes a long way. Works great to give you that glowy summer bronze. Easy to blend formula! I highly recommend this product and love the Cali ray brand!

reviews.review_title: A great liquid bronzer at a great price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so excited I had the chance to test this beautiful new liquid bronzer early because it's such a great formula.  It has the texture of a serum and feels moisturizing on the skin. I found that it set itself (thank goodness) vs feeling tacky - and it has a natural finish despite it looking like it might be glittery. There are some fine shimmers but nothing chunky.  As for the shade, I found it to be a warm-toned medium bronze shade. It does sheer out just enough that it doesn't appear quite as bronze as it does in the bottle, and I found it did not disturb the makeup I had on underneath it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Caliray products and this one is a new favorite! This bronzer is so pretty and looks beautiful on my skin! It blends very well and smoothly. I also loved that it lasted on my skin throughout the day I definitely recommend!

This is an amazing bronzer! Perfect for the summer and love that it has skincare ingredients so it is also good for the skin. It has light coverage that is slightly buildable, so it is perfect to wear on its own or under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this serum bronzer! It makes my skin so luminous without it looking shiny. I love how it makes my skin feel supple and radiant. This will definitely be my go to all simmer long! Definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the finish of this new liquid bronzer! It feels so hydrating on my skin and I love that it applies streak free. It goes on sheer, but you can definitely build it up! It blurs and makes my skin look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this serum bronzer! It has the perfect amount of pigment without being too much! It just melts in your skin like butter! There’s legit no way to even mess this up! I love using it on my body even

This Calibray bronzer is amazing! It’s a great dupe for more expensive bronzing drops, and it looks really natural on my skin. Love the price point as well, it’s so affordable and I definitely recommend!
